DOC.brief_title: Encouraging Young Adults Make Effective Nutrition Choices
DOC.detailed_description: In support NIH goal improve people 's health support healthy lifestyle , conduct randomize trial evaluate age-targeted web-based intervention design improve diet young adult ( age 21-30 ) navigate new life stage great independence . The goal study increase daily intake fruit vegetable ( FV ) young adult born 1980 , know `` Generation Y '' ( GenY ) , use relevant feature appeal group . This five-year project two phase . In first phase , use focus group confirm plan , key intervention element target need preference GenY build engagement intervention , revise test , effective Internet- base intervention ( Making Effective Nutrition Choices MENU , U19-CA079689 ) . The MENU study design support increase FV intake , rely solely e-media ( internet email ) . In proposed study revise MENU curriculum , apply age-targeted theory-based method improve intervention engagement effectiveness GenY dietary behavior change . The intervention use three psychosocial feature subject empirical examination age group : Social Cognitive Theory , Self-Determination Theory ( SDT ) , special attention Social Marketing Theory ( SMT ) , emphasize understanding total environment well shape health communication . In develop program , apply knowledge GenY developmental psychology , guide consultant formative research individual , environmental societal factor collect preliminary study Phase I GenY focus group . Focus group member evaluate validated MENU intervention , well revise age-targeted , interactive `` MENU GenY '' intervention prior launch . In second phase , evaluate efficacy MENU GenY intervention , include add value self-initiated , personalized e-coaching support email , supplement tailor online intervention . Specifically , use sample 1624 adult , age 21 - 30 two geographically distinct region ( urban Detroit rural Pennsylvania ) , employ randomize , three arm design , primary aim Phase II 1 ) determine agetargeted , tailor web-based intervention efficacious improve primary outcome daily intake FV compare untailored intervention arm age target ( control arm ) ; 2 ) determine tailor webbased intervention age target personalize e-coaching support efficacious control ; 3 ) determine tailor web-based intervention age target e-counseling efficacious tailor web-based intervention age target alone .
DOC.criteria: 2130 year age receive medical care Henry Ford Health System ( Detroit , MI ) Geisinger Health System ( Danville area central Pennsylvania )
